meta.notes: Hierarchical taxonomy for 9 Communik8 complaints. L1 = customer-visible symptoms. L2 = mechanisms/root causes.

customer_service.definition: Negative experience interacting with service channels: long waits, unhelpful or rude staff, poor call/chat handling.
exclude: website usability issues without staff interaction
delivery delays with no service interaction
prototypes: I waited a very long time for my call to be answered.
Customer service was useless and did not resolve my issue.
The staff were rude and laughed at me when I asked for help.
I never received a response to my complaint email.

store_experience.definition: In-person experience at a retail location involving staff behaviour or support quality.
include: rude or dismissive staff in store
in-store help with handset was refused or mocked
exclude: general customer service not tied to a store visit
prototypes: Store staff were rude when I needed handset help.
At the Riverside store the team laughed at me.
In-store support was disrespectful and unhelpful.

delivery.definition: Problems with promised delivery times or fulfillment of orders.
include: handset took longer than stated to arrive
prototypes: My handset arrived far later than promised.
Delivery missed the 48-hour promise.
I cancelled the order because delivery was delayed for two weeks.

billing.definition: Incorrect charges, duplicate payments, billing errors, or debt collection letters.
include: debt collector letter after billing error
exclude: shipping fee disputes tied primarily to delivery
prototypes: I was charged twice in one month.
The bill was wrong and I refused to pay.
I received a debt collector's letter following a billing mistake.

coverage.definition: Poor mobile signal, inability to make/receive calls, patchy mobile data.
include: can't make or receive calls due to signal
coverage in my area is rubbish
prototypes: Coverage in my area is very poor.
I cannot make or receive calls because of bad signal.
The mobile data connection keeps dropping.

website_chat.definition: Website or chat usability/support problems: limited channels, irrelevant or ungrammatical responses.
include: only way to ask questions is chat
prototypes: The website is hard to use and support is only via chat.
Chat responses were irrelevant and ungrammatical.
Online help channels did not provide meaningful answers.

contract_cancellation.definition: Cooling-off period misunderstandings, failed cancellation requests, or being tied into unwanted contracts.
include: told cancellation would occur automatically but it did not
exclude: refund processing time after a valid cancellation
delivery cancellations due solely to shipping delays
prototypes: I tried to cancel within the cooling-off period but it did not happen.
They said cancellation would occur automatically and it did not.
I am now tied into a long contract I do not want.

loyalty_retention.definition: Risks to churn or complaints about lack of response despite long-term loyalty.
include: waiting a month for response to complaint
prototypes: I have been a loyal customer for years and plan to cancel.
No one replied to my complaint email for a month.

communication_failures.definition: Failures in receiving, routing, or answering customer communications across channels.
exclude: pure website UX without support content
network coverage unrelated to contact handling
prototypes: Customer messages are not answered promptly.
Contact centre queues are too long for the available staffing.
Agent responses are low quality or irrelevant.

workflow_process.definition: Breakdowns in internal process execution: cancellations, escalations, ticket routing, SLA adherence.
prototypes: Cancellation requests are not executed correctly.
Cases are not handed off between teams with clear ownership.
SLA breaches occur due to poor process control.

information_systems.definition: Data integrity and transactional consistency problems in billing/CRM/ordering systems.
prototypes: The billing system produced a duplicate charge.
Account balances are inconsistent after payment.
Invoices contain incorrect amounts due to data errors.

logistics_fulfillment.definition: Operational failures in warehousing, dispatch, carrier performance, or ETA promises.
prototypes: Orders are delivered later than the promised timeframe.
Carrier performance causes missed delivery windows.
ETA promises are not aligned with actual capacity.

network_infrastructure.definition: Radio access and backhaul limitations impacting signal and data connectivity in an area.
exclude: app bugs unrelated to the network
prototypes: Signal strength is insufficient to maintain calls.
The mobile network coverage is poor in this location.
Data connection is unstable and frequently drops.

digital_channel_design.definition: Usability and content quality of website/chat channels including NLP/chatbot responses.
include: chat only support with poor answers
website makes it hard to ask questions
prototypes: The website funnels all support into a limited chat channel.
Chat responses are irrelevant and poorly written.
Self-service flow does not answer common questions.

policy_terms.definition: Product/contract terms, cooling-off rules, and their operational interpretation.
include: cooling-off period cancellation rules not honoured
auto-cancel policy promised but not executed
exclude: delivery or billing issues not tied to policy
prototypes: Cooling-off cancellations should be honoured within the period.
Automatic cancellation policies must be implemented consistently.
Contract terms must not lock customers in after a valid cancellation.
